mese pawasuwe palathe malu welendeki.kolambaa, kurunagala, thrikunamalaya ha madakalapuwa bala yana yapane samanya wasiyanta, wyaparika katayuthu sandaha gamanwala yedennata menma, nadayan hamuwima sandaha yana ayata ha thama upan gam bala paminena pawule samajikayan guwan thotupale di hamuwimata yana ayata sahaya labadimata janadhipathithumata kala hakke kumakdayi adahas pala kirimata yapane pradhana bas nawathumpole welasatahankaru ?shriwardhan mahatha da idiripath wiya.rathriye di langama bas hatharak da ude ek bas rathayak da kolambaa bala pitath wanne yayi ?shriwardhan mahatha pawasi ya.‘eka bas rathayaka 40 denek geniyanawa.

samanyana thathwaya yatathe eeta wada adu mattamin indrirayan wetha labena sanniwedana sandaha apage pancha indritayan pratathichara nodakwayi.meya indrinayanhi pawathina sanwedibawayi.samanye piyawi thathwayanta paribahira atham adhimanasika hakiya athi awasthawaladi indriiyanhi sanwedibawa samanyaya pra manayata wada adhika we.ewita samanyaba thathwayan yatathe nolabu eheth sabawinma me lokaye pawathina wiwidha dramashyada, shratawana, aaghranana, rasa, sparsha aadi siyum sanniwedana indriayan wethata labagatha haki mattamakata sanjananaya diyunu we.ese diyunu sanjanana hakiyawa wiwidhakara hethu nisa labiya haki.me mattamata indri ya kridayakarithwaya diyunu kirima puhunuwa mangin kalahaki we.esema upathinma yam yam ayata me hakiyawa pihita thibiya haka.samaharunta suwisheshi awastha walata muhunapama nisa mebandu sanjanana athiwiya haka.nidasun washayen adhikawa biyata pathwimanisa samaharunta wiwidha dakim penim, shriwanayawim, aaghanayawim, rasadanim ha sparshayawim siduwe.me sanjanana samanyapa piyawi manasika thathwaya yatathe kesewath nolabi haki awasthaya.

budu dahama widyawa ha samapatha wana dahamak nowe...eya awama tharame widyawa ha ath wal banda gena yana dahamak wath nowe...budu dahama nuthana widyawata wada aaloka warsha gananawak ihalin athi, kisidu widyarthiyekuta wishaya gochara nowana, athi supiri, parama sathyawadi dakmaki..budu dahama hamuwe thabana nuthana widyawa, sata wiyathi bamunu pandiwarayeku idiriye indawana lada, napiye muthra kara ganna saya masathi bilindekuge thathwayata pathwe..ewani wishwa nyanayak, behewin belahina nuthana widyawa samanga athwal bandagena walle awidina pem yuwalakage thathwayata path karannata yama, ema maha sathyayata karana ithama barapathala asadharanayaki.. ....
